thread.section_title: Warwick New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our USA Tour - Review
thread.title_full: Our USA Tour - Review of Warwick New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tony F
title: Our USA Tour - Review
text:
We arrived here Christmas Eve for a four day stay.
The rooms are a good size although the bathroom was really small
It is a older style hotel with lots of history situated in downtown.
The bar was good for a cocktail or beer the staff mostly where friendly and it is central to most of the sights
It really gave you the New York experience
It's not the newest hotel but certainly has lots to offer
